item.title: How to write a blog with org-mode and hugo.
item.description: Build a blog with Emacs, Hugo and org-mode its more easy than your think. Requirements. Emacs Hugo ox-hugo Install ox-hugo First we need to install ox-hugo ;; Maybe you need to add melpa repository in your `init.el' file (add-to-list 'package-archives '("melpa" . "https://melpa.org/packages/") t) ;; M-x install-package RET ox-hugo ;; Then load it after `ox' (eval-after-load 'ox (require 'ox-hugo)) ;; or if your use `use-package' to install and load the package.
